about.title: About Us
about.historyText: Billionboys was born from the passion to create garments that reflect a leader's classic personality, founded in 2021 by a young dreamer who wanted to leave a mark and art in the world.
about.missionText: Create garments of exceptional quality that reflect the authenticity and personality of each customer. We are committed to offering unique designs that combine urban style with comfort, democratizing premium fashion and making it accessible to all those who seek to express their individuality.
about.visionText: To be the reference brand in premium urban fashion, recognized for our constant innovation, commitment to quality and dedication to creating memorable experiences. We aspire to expand our Billion Boys community globally, maintaining our values of authenticity, sustainability and inclusivity.
about.value1Text: Original designs that reflect your true personality
about.value3Text: Fashion for everyone, regardless of size, age or style
about.value4Text: Constantly exploring new trends and techniques
